text: Juan Carlos Osorio Arbel√°ez (; born 8 June 1961) is a Colombian professional football manager and former footballer. He played as a midfielder. He managed the Mexico national football team from 2015 until 2018 and Paraguay from 2018 until 2019. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Football managers
title: Juan Carlos Osorio
